functionDecorators.name: createToken
functionDecorators.description: Create a new synthetic token with permit function and return it to the caller. The caller will become the only minter and burner and the new owner capable of assigning the roles.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenName
parameterDecorators.description: used to describe the new token.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenSymbol
parameterDecorators.description: short ticker abbreviation of the name. Ideally < 5 chars.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenDecimals
parameterDecorators.description: used to define the precision used in the token's numerical representation.

returnDecorators.name: newToken
returnDecorators.description: an instance of the newly created token.
